backend/main.mo: Motoko canister that stores inquiries and user profiles with admin-protected CRUD and role-based authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of autogenerated summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files in the project.
frontend/.env: Environment config setting VITE_SITE_NAME for development.
frontend/.env.production: Environment config setting VITE_SITE_NAME for production builds.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, fonts, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that switches between the public site and the office admin page based on URL hash.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing branding, contact details, and an Instagram link.
frontend/src/components/LightboxModal.ts: Modal component displaying a large image with title and category, closable via UI or Escape key.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-based styling, section scrolling, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an about section with company description, highlight cards, and a list of specialties. Uses mapped UI components and icons for structured presentation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact section with static contact details and an inquiry form powered by a custom hook. Handles submission state, validation errors, and success UI.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Displays a hero section with background imagery, marketing text, and buttons that smooth-scroll to other sections. Includes a scroll indicator and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Package: Shows an accordion listing photography packages with coverage, deliverables, turnaround, and optional add-ons. Pulls structured data from packagesData.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Provides a filterable portfolio grid with category selection and a lightbox modal for viewing images. Filters items based on selected category.
frontend/src/components/sections/Pricing: Displays pricing tiers in card layout with features, pricing, and a button that scrolls to the contact section. Supports highlighting a featured tier.
frontend/src/content/packages.ts: Exports package definitions containing pricing, coverage, deliverables, add-ons, and terms. Used to populate package details in the UI.
frontend/src/content/portfolio.ts: Defines portfolio item types and exports an array of categorized portfolio images.
frontend/src/content/pricing.ts: Defines pricing tier structure and exports three photography package configurations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiryForm.ts: Manages inquiry form state, validation, submission, and reset logic using a saveInquiry mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for inquiries, user profiles, and authorization using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and typography settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/OfficeInquiriesPage.t: Admin page handling login, profile setup, inquiry listing, deletion, and message parsing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), storing them in sessionStorage, and retrieving or clearing persisted values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current requirements and constraints for a minimal photography website, including pages, branding updates, inquiry form behavior, and admin-area expectations.
